verbose_text: Chemical inhibitors of the glycogen synthase kinase 3 (GSK3) are very attractive tools as they allow the control of pluripotency in mouse and rat ES cells [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR] and may be used to direct human ES cells into mesodermal or endodermal cell fates via activation of the canonical Wnt-pathway [XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR].
evidence: inhibitors of the glycogen synthase kinase 3 (GSK3
